name: Work Order Matching
description: Link purchase invoices to application and labor work orders for cost allocation.

prd.problemStatement: Understanding true costs requires linking purchases to the work orders where products and labor were used. Work order matching enables accurate cost allocation.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want invoices matched to work orders so that I understand true job costs
As a superintendent, I want cost allocation so that I can analyze spending by area or activity
